content: with just a simple square you can make this adorable folded pillow cover created using bernat softee chunky this crochet pillow is irresistibly cushy learn to work moss stitch in rounds to create the unique stripe effect that wraps around the front and back of the pillow measuring 20 square you can create a selection in different colors to accent all your favorite spaces with warmth and color bernat® softee chunky™ 3 5 oz/100 g 108 yds/99 m contrast a taupe gray 28048 1 ball or 88 yds/80 m contrast b gray rose 28800 1 ball or 64 yds/58 m contrast c gray blue 28802 1 ball or 73 yds/67 m contrast d brass 28807 1 ball or 79 yds/72 m measurements approximately 26½ 67 5 cm square before assembly 20 51 cm square after assembly
